metadata.title: CVE-2022-4920 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Blink in Google Chrome prior to 101.0.4951.41allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UIgestures to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
